9:19 AM| This is the worst job I've seen the Fact Checker ever do. The rating is belied by facts provided in Fact Checker's own column. In 1998: In August 1998, Iraq said it was suspending cooperation with the inspectors... In November, Iraq reversed itself and said it would cooperate, but the cooperation was not forthcoming.[ ellipsis added] So there you have it, on two separate occasions, Saddam Hussein refused to cooperate with weapons inspectors present in his country.
